This would be a great Micro-HD release if it does not have German hardcoded subs, the NFO by the uploaded says "No Sub" so is that accurate? And if so why are people saying it has hardcoded German subs?

Trying to figure out the confusing comments about hard-coded German subs so I downloaded the sample. There are no hard-coded subs on the English dialogue in the sample. A comment above says that there are hard-coded German subs on the foreign language dialogue. I interpret foreign in this case to mean non-English, therefore hard-coded subs in German will appear. The US version will be released on 28 Sept, so I suggest English speakers wait for that one.
